* Responsive image → class `img-responsive`
* Centre text → class `text-center`
* Button → class `btn btn-default`
* Button fill all width → class `btn btn-default btn-block`
* Make button color as primary color of app → replace `btn-default` to `btn-primary`
* Pre defined button colors
    - Optional actions → `btn-info`
    - Destructive action → `btn-danger`
* Button colors applies to texts as well
    - `text-primary`, `text-danger` etc.
* Bootstrap Grid: It uses 12-coloumn grid
    - First put grid elements in a div of class `row` and then use column class in each grid element.
    - It has three parts → `col`-`screenwidth`-`how many column`
    - For medium screen → class `col-md-<num>`
    - For extra small screen → class `col-xs-<num>`
